snippet: Stoke City goalkeeper Jack Butland has signed a new contract that will keep the 23-year-old England international at the Premier League club until 2021, Stoke said on their website on Friday....

headline.main: Butland Commits Long-Term Future to Stoke
headline.print_headline: Butland Commits Long-Term Future to Stoke

lead_paragraph: Stoke City goalkeeper Jack Butland has signed a new contract that will keep the 23-year-old England international at the Premier League club until 2021, Stoke said on their website on Friday.

snippet: Newcastle United have completed the signing of Andros Townsend from Tottenham Hotspur on a five-and-a-half-year deal, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have completed the signing of Andros Townsend from Tottenham Hotspur on a five-and-a-half-year deal, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday.

snippet: Swansea City skipper Leon Britton believes foiling old friend Jermain Defoe will be key to his team's hopes of overcoming Sunderland in Saturday's Premier League relegation zone battle....

headline.main: Britton Wary of Old Friend Defoe Ahead of Relegation-Zone Battle
headline.print_headline: Britton Wary of Old Friend Defoe Ahead of Relegation-Zone Battle

lead_paragraph: Swansea City skipper Leon Britton believes foiling old friend Jermain Defoe will be key to his team's hopes of overcoming Sunderland in Saturday's Premier League relegation zone battle.

snippet: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger says he is not convinced by FIFA president Gianni Infantino's proposal to expand the World Cup from 32 to 48 teams in time for 2026....

headline.main: Wenger Sceptical Over Expanded World Cup
headline.print_headline: Wenger Sceptical Over Expanded World Cup

lead_paragraph: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger says he is not convinced by FIFA president Gianni Infantino's proposal to expand the World Cup from 32 to 48 teams in time for 2026.

snippet: New Swansea City manager Bob Bradley believes that becoming the first American coach in the English Premier League will increase the profile and popularity of soccer in the United States....

headline.main: Swansea Job a Chance to Promote Soccer in the U.S.-Bradley
headline.print_headline: Swansea Job a Chance to Promote Soccer in the U.S.-Bradley

lead_paragraph: New Swansea City manager Bob Bradley believes that becoming the first American coach in the English Premier League will increase the profile and popularity of soccer in the United States.

snippet: Netherlands forward Giorginio Wijnaldum has joined Liverpool from relegated Newcastle United, the English Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: Liverpool Seal Big-Money Deal for Dutch Forward Wijnaldum
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Seal Big-Money Deal for Dutch Forward Wijnaldum

lead_paragraph: Netherlands forward Giorginio Wijnaldum has joined Liverpool from relegated Newcastle United, the English Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: West Ham United have sold out of season tickets ahead of next season's move to London's Olympic Stadium, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: West Ham Sell All Season Tickets for New Stadium
headline.print_headline: West Ham Sell All Season Tickets for New Stadium

lead_paragraph: West Ham United have sold out of season tickets ahead of next season's move to London's Olympic Stadium, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Manager Bob Bradley is determined to ensure Swansea City recapture the fluid style of play that has helped them maintain Premier League status since the club won promotion to the top flight in 2011....

headline.main: Swansea Must Recapture Fluid Style of Play, Says Bradley
headline.print_headline: Swansea Must Recapture Fluid Style of Play, Says Bradley

lead_paragraph: Manager Bob Bradley is determined to ensure Swansea City recapture the fluid style of play that has helped them maintain Premier League status since the club won promotion to the top flight in 2011.

snippet: Crystal Palace beat struggling Stoke City 4-1 on Sunday with defenders James Tomkins and Scott Dann both scoring from set pieces in a three-minute first half spell....

headline.main: Crystal Palace Hit Four Past Struggling Stoke City
headline.print_headline: Crystal Palace Hit Four Past Struggling Stoke City

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace beat struggling Stoke City 4-1 on Sunday with defenders James Tomkins and Scott Dann both scoring from set pieces in a three-minute first half spell.

snippet: Norwich City need to change their mentality if they are to make a quick return to the Premier League, manager Alex Neil said  after the club ended their campaign with a 3-0 defeat by Everton at Goodison Park on Sunday....

headline.main: Norwich Need Mindset Change to Return to Top Flight-Neil
headline.print_headline: Norwich Need Mindset Change to Return to Top Flight-Neil

lead_paragraph: Norwich City need to change their mentality if they are to make a quick return to the Premier League, manager Alex Neil said  after the club ended their campaign with a 3-0 defeat by Everton at Goodison Park on Sunday.
